d:
This is mostly a plot exposition and world building chapter, also introduces some new characters. I'm trying to level-up my storytelling and plots. Doesn't have much action, but if you like this story and would like me to continue it, please support me by buying. A good story needs time to build up, which will make the action scene even HOTTER when it arrives. Chapter 5 will SPICY btw ðŸ˜ˆ
